actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide that an individual who is entitled both to an old-age or disability insurance benefit and to a survivor's benefit may simultaneously receive the larger of such benefits plus one-half of the smaller.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Provides that an individual who is entitled both to an old-age or disability insurance benefit and to a survivor's benefit under title II (Old-Age, Survivors, and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act may simultaneously receive the larger of such benefits plus one-half of the smaller.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide that an individual who is entitled both to an old-age or disability insurance benefit and to a survivor's benefit may simultaneously receive the larger of such benefits plus one-half of the smaller.
